## Definition of Done Checklist

- [ ] **Shipped** - Code merged and deployed to staging
- [ ] **Tested** - Jest unit tests + integration tests + Cypress E2E tests pass
- [ ] **Logged** - Events and audit log entries added where applicable
- [ ] **Secured** - Zod validation, RBAC checks, rate limits, input sanitization
- [ ] **Documented** - Docs updated, SETUP.md updated if keys/config changed

- [ ] Integration tests added/updated
- [ ] E2E tests added/updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

## Security Considerations
<!-- Any security implications? -->
